direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve checking or retrieving information about options, though they perform different operations.
Both methods interact with options and handle similar types of input (option names).
Both methods involve processing options and handling similar types of input (option names).
Both methods modify the state of the options list, though one checks for existence and the other adds an option.

enhanced_by.reason: Adding options is necessary to set up the state for checking if an option exists.
Checking the value of an option can be part of the process before or after checking if the option exists.
Parsing the option value can be used to assert the state or behavior after checking if the option exists.
